algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming with bitmasking to represent subsets of cookies
problem_summary_simple: Distribute cookies to k children to minimize the maximum cookies any child receives.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP with bitmasking to find minimum maximum sum of subsets for k partitions.
key_insights: This problem is a variation of the Partition Problem, aiming to minimize the maximum sum.
Bitmasking is used to represent all possible subsets of cookies.
The DP state `dp[i][mask]` represents the minimum unfairness using `i` children for the cookies represented by `mask`.
